attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Killing is ocurring every day in the uk . it is so bad people won t go out at night . Lets get the police out of their cars and patrol the cities.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Police-Patrols/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
